features: 【2K Clarity & 360° Coverage】: The light bulb security camera offers a crystal-clear 2K super HD live stream, enabling you to monitor pets or babies with exceptional detail. Control the camera's horizontal movement by 360° and vertical movement by 52° through the app, providing a comprehensive view of your home. You can see clearly what is happening out of your door, any minor vulnerabilities can be captured by the camera, to help you and your family avoid these potential danger.

【2.4GHz&5GHz Dual-Band Wifi Connection】: This outdoor camera supports the connection to both 2.4GHz and 5GHz WiFi, offering extensive compatibility that alleviates concerns about connecting the camera to your WiFi network. If you're unsure about the frequency band of your WiFi, opting for this camera is a sure choice, as it seamlessly matches both 2.4GHz and 5GHz WiFi.

【Easy Installed Wireless Camera】: Install this wireless outdoor security camera using a standard E27 bulb base (110V~240V). It's ETL certified for safety. Simply download the App on your mobile phone, and use it to easily connect the bulb camera to your 2.4GHz/5GHz WiFi. No additional steps are necessary.

【Motion Detection & Instant Alert】: This indoor security camera utilizes a human filtering function to minimize false alarms, ensuring you receive immediate phone alerts upon detecting motion. You'll receive instant notifications if human motion is detected. The sensitivity of the home camera can be adjusted to prevent frequent disturbances from unnecessary alarms.

【Multi-user & Two-way Audio】: Share the device via the app for joint control, enabling multiple users to access it. Utilize the built-in microphone and speaker to communicate with those near the surveillance camera.
body.description: 2K Light Bulb Camera with 2.4GHz / 5GHz ConnectionCapture every detail in stunning clarity with this 2K wireless light bulb security camera, providing comprehensive home monitoring without missing crucial information. Compatible with both 2.4GHz & 5GHz Wi-Fi networks, ensuring seamless connectivity.Equipped with an IR-CUT function, this camera delivers crisp videos and photos day and night, ensuring clear visibility even in darkness.The PTZ function allows 360° horizontal rotation, offering endless monitoring possibilities. Remotely control the camera's movement to keep an eye on every corner, including your beloved pets.Easy InstallationThis Light Bulb outdoor camera compatible with general E27 light bulb base, you even don't need to worry about to install it in which place, and we also packed one light bulb base, what you need to do is tighten the camera on the base, and plug the base in outlet.Remote Monitoring & Two-way AudioSupporting up to 16 simultaneous app users, this home security camera is versatile for use in homes, offices, and stores. Easily share access with family or friends to cherish heartwarming moments together.With the built-in microphone and speaker, communicate with individuals around the surveillance camera.Motion Detection & Instant NotificationExperience real-time monitoring of every movement in the room. Receive immediate app notifications when any motion is detected, with motion tracking, ensuring the camera follows moving objects.If someone appears at your doorstep, you will immediately receive a notification, effectively preventing strangers from entering your home.If you encounter a delivery person bringing a package to your door while you're not home, the package left at your doorstep will not be lost.What You Get:1 * Light Bulb Security Camera;1 * Power Adapter;Thoughtful after-sales service. Get reply within 24 hours.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 5.0 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 ratings 5.0 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and good quality
reviews.reviewText: The installation process was straightforward. In terms of image quality and night vision, it delivers sharp and clear visuals, even in low-light conditions. The camera has a built-in light source that can further enhance visibility during the night. Moreover, it automatically turns off the light when motion is detected. In theory, this should deter potential intruders since the light goes off as soon as they enter the camera's range, which, in my case, is approximately 30 feet from where the camera is installed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation, outstanding quality, and I adore the app!
reviews.reviewText: This camera can be installed easily, insert it in the socket, and finished! And the image is so clear that I can see each person passing by in front of my door clearly. The APP can download the vedio without taking out the card.
